author: esammer
msg: - Removed context param from LifecycleAware methods. Those that want config data should

author: lofwyr
msg: TOBAGO-1022: Support for a default validator in input components like JSF 2.0 (JSR-303)
- getting the BeanValidator from the Application in case of JSF 2.0

author: jfarrell
msg: Thrift-1279: type set is handled incorrectly when writing object
Fixes issue to iIterate through scalar types correctly.

author: rajith
msg: QPID-3466 Removed the 'create:always' option when constructing the
address string from the replyTo construct. The application which sets
the replyTo is responsible for creating/deleting the replyTo destination
and not the one who sends messages to it.

author: sebb
msg: LANG-744 StringUtils throws java.security.AccessControlException on Google App Engine
Change static code to catch and save Exception; only report failure if no method is available
